data.eml:eml: The genus Paraplonobia Wainstein and Neopetrobia Wainstein (Acari, Trombidiformes, Tetranychidae) from Saudi Arabia: new species, new records and key to the world species of Paraplonobia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamran, Muhammad, Mirza, Jawwad Hassan, Alatawi, Fahad Jaber (2016): The genus Paraplonobia Wainstein and Neopetrobia Wainstein (Acari, Trombidiformes, Tetranychidae) from Saudi Arabia: new species, new records and key to the world species of Paraplonobia. ZooKeys 598: 27-55, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.598.9060, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.598.9060
